item.title: Vehicle Accident Detection Using FPGA
item.description: Introduction Have you seen my previous post? If yes, I know you will definitely come here to see my new post.. ğŸ˜Œ. what if your answer is No? Then you will definitely come here next timeğŸ¥². What’s new this timeğŸ™„?… Vehicle Accident detection using FPGA ğŸ˜®â€ğŸ’¨. Ew? FPGAğŸ˜¦? What’s that? Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) are semiconductor devices that are based around a matrix of configurable logic blocks (CLBs) connected via programmable interconnects.
